alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 6:16PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington, southeastern Wayne and northern Greene Counties through 700 PM CST... At 616 PM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of State Line, or 16 miles east of Richton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chatom, Deer Park, State Line and Fruitdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
